org.bulldog.core.gpio

Interface DigitalIO

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DigitalInput, DigitalOutput, PinFeature
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DigitalIOFeature

    public interface DigitalIO
extends DigitalInput, DigitalOutput
    The Interface DigitalIO is a composition of the interfaces DigitalInput and DigitalOutput. The pin is dynamically configured as either an output or an input depending on its usage. A call to read will configure it as an input, a call to write will configure it as an output. The pin can also be dynamically reconfigured - it is not stuck in its configuration but will rather adjust to the requested operation.
    See Also:
    DigitalInput, DigitalOutput

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Checks if the pin is currently used as an input.
